document_data.name: Dagh Illance
document_data.mainbody: '''Dagh Illance''' was a knight and a member of the [[Illance]] noble family in [[Cormyr]] who rode with [[Alusair Obarskyr]].
document_data.Personality: He was hot tempered and battle-hungry,
document_data.History: In the [[1369 DR|Year of the Gauntlet, 1369 DR]], Alusair and her knights were operating in the Stonelands, pursuing a bold [[orc]] band that had raided a caravan east of [[Eveningstar]]; in six days of pursuit, they'd killed a [[hydra]], a "[[fire lizard]]", and three [[chimera]]s. They were on a high meadow north of [[Startop Crag]] when they sighted the orcs; Dagh was the first to hurl a spear and the knights impetuously pursued the orcs into an ambush. Their [[dark naga]] master hurled a lightning bolt and Dagh and a few others were killed, before Alusair rallied her forces to defeat their foes. She muttered "good riddance to Illance".
